title: The Romans: life, laughter and laws
creator_credit: Ian Brims, John H. Secondari and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Examines certain facets of the Roman way of life: dictatorship; Julius Caesar; poetry; Imperial Rome; law; and the evils of living in an urban society. Suitable for lower secondary level.
